candidates.title: chore: Update CI and fix clippy warnings [fixes FLU-251]
Update libp2p-core to 0.38
candidates.body:
BEGIN_COMMIT_OVERRIDE
fix(deps): Update libp2p-core to 0.38 (#51)
END_COMMIT_OVERRIDE

candidates.title: feat(keypair): add KeyPair::from_secret_key
candidates.body:
chore: update libp2p-core to 0.36

chore: update libsecp256k1 to 0.7.1

candidates.title: Add memory leak temporary mitigation
candidates.body: Add a temporary workaround for the problem mentioned in https://github.com/WebAssembly/wasi-libc/issues/298

candidates.title: High-level Aqua API
candidates.body:
- add high-level TG API
- add export.aqua to npm package
- rework example with multiple nodes

candidates.title: Fix revocations logic
candidates.body:
Previously revocation works only in a direct way, just revoke the previous trust A -> B. 
Now it revokes all chains which contain a path from A to B, for example, A -> C -> D -> B
Also changed `Revoke` structure naming to plural `Revocation`

candidates.title: Trust Graph: implement WASM built-in
candidates.body:
- Closes #16
- Closes #11 
- build WASM TrustGraph service with peer ids API
- add js example how to use TG: sign trusts/revocations, get certificates
- set up CI
- build TG as a builtin package (like aqua-ipfs or aqua-dht)

candidates.title: Remove serde version lock
candidates.body: It was locked on `serde = "=1.0.118"`, I've relaxed it to `serde = "1.0.118"`

chosen_pr.title: feat(deps)!: update libp2p to 0.39.1 and other deps
